category: news
title: "Zone Adopts ThetaRay AI Solution to Monitor and Screen Payments in Nigeria"
excerpt: "Africa’s first regulated layer-1 blockchain network for payments, and ThetaRay, a leading provider of AI-powered transaction monitoring technology, today announced they will collaborate to implement ThetaRay’s cloud-based SONAR solution to monitor and screen Zone’s transactions in Nigeria for illicit activities and sanctions violations."
